lender.name: Tee
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help someone who really appreciates it.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: There are times in everyone's lives when they need help. I have had my share and would like to give a little.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3-5 year olds. They are energetic and curious and funny and I sleep very well at night. :) I am sure they are just the same all over the world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I account for oil & gas from wellhead to pipeline.

lender.name: The Adkins Family
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. Such a small amount can change a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: My most important job is Mother to 3 boys and sometimes Foster Mother to many more. My paying job is at a credit card company.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: it's a small way to make a big difference.

lender.name: margaret
lender.loan_because: i want to help people better their circumstances, either through education, job training or better living conditions.
lender.occupational_info: i work at an apartment facility for low-income seniors - i also volunteer assistance for people who are blind. My organization, AudioVision, Inc. provides descriptive services for films, theatre, opera, etc for them.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I want to see who I am helping and how my money is being used.
lender.occupational_info: Working in the volunteer sector in the UK1

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to improve their lives and the lives of their children - the trickle down effect is huge!
lender.occupational_info: My work helps pharmaceutical companies and safety agencies in our government decide which new medications are the safest and most effective.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in recruiting and hiring of employees. I also make decisions on benefits and employee problems

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Helping people improve their families and their lives.

lender.name: Chris & Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings God has given to my family and I with others.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: people should be given a chance to succeed and better themselves. This is not about handouts, it's an investment in global prosperity, and ultimately, world peace.
lender.occupational_info: I do sales reporting and forecasting, plus report on the profitability for my company's department. By loaning money to individuals through Kiva, it's possible that I might create the need for a financial analyst in another country.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want these people to succeed. They deserve a chance to better their lives.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone else who is self-employed.
lender.occupational_info: I make one of a kind, unique children/crib bedding and accessories.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nurse in Boston. I love to help people in any way I can!

lender.name: Miriam
lender.occupational_info: I make and sell turbans and hats and design and sew custom clothing, while taking care of my 8 children.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to see a change in the world

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that want to improve their life and be independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work on machines that make automotive connectors.

lender.name: marilyn
lender.loan_because: I would like to help women get ahead in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a chef/caterer. I have worked all my life in the kitchen and love it. Now I teach others to cook.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone achieve their dream.

lender.name: Knight
lender.loan_because: I want to give back. I've never been loaned money, but the loan of friendships have enriched my life
lender.occupational_info: I write daily articles about aspects of life that that make me smile in hope that the articles will make others smile.

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my daughter about giving.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: In loving memory of my mother Nancy, who always wanted to make a difference in the World. . . . now she can.
lender.occupational_info: Grad student.

lender.name: Kim & Sam
lender.occupational_info: I am going back to school (later in life) to be a mathematics teacher.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: My neice told me about Kiva this summer. I have been "hooked" ever since. It makes it so simply to help others and participate in their success.
lender.occupational_info: I retired last April from the Texas Department of Human Services where I managed two Food Stamp,Medicaid, and TANF eligibility determination offices. I have seen first hand what can happen when people are given a chance.

lender.name: gina
lender.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic idea. I am so blessed and I even though we don't have a lot of extra money, I love the idea that together we can all help.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two young boys.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Sounds so cliche, but I really enjoy helping people! I heard about this organization on Oprah and fell in love!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I think the concept is unique and the effects are empowering to those who need help to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage construction related activities.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work helping people solve their computer problems in payroll and HR.

lender.name: Maria and Marc
lender.loan_because: we think this program is amazing...imagine making a difference across the world with a touch of a button!

lender.name: Scott, Sheila & Adelaide
lender.loan_because: I am always impressed with people who are willing to stand up and create opportunities for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Buy product for a national retail company.

lender.name: Dreme
lender.loan_because: Someone has always been there for me.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I loan money because I can and want to see if individuals take advantage of my giving and change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a buyer for a large medical company that manufactures medical devices that are distributed throughout the world

lender.name: Fissel Family
lender.loan_because: We want to give to those in need and help them to better themselves and succeed.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Providing HOPE is a great feeling!
lender.occupational_info: I work for Lifetouch, a large photography company who photographs children across the US and Canada. I book the preschool photographers schedules here in Oklahoma.

lender.name: Myles
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have access to capital.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers in Washington DC.

lender.name: Kim & Eric
lender.loan_because: We loan because we like the idea of helping people around the world create better lives for themselves. Kim heard about the website on the Oprah show and got inspired to help change someone's life!
lender.occupational_info: Kim is a music teacher and Eric works with inernational students at our local University. We have a beautiful baby girl, too!

lender.name: Bailey Books
lender.loan_because: I am a self-employed, mom to two full-time and one who does not live with me (she's all grown now!). I know how hard it is to start a thriving business!! I know, that by helping others, I am helping myself as it is only through giving and generosity, that we can truly receive!!
lender.occupational_info: I sell books online through a variety of sites such as Amazon.

lender.name: MM Power
lender.loan_because: This is an easy way for people around the world to help people in the world. Thank you Kiva for making this possible.
lender.occupational_info: M&M Power

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: factory worker

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed in this life & want to share my blessings with people that need help. I love to see others to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I am nurse & am fortunate to be able to help people feel better. I hate to see anyone suffer!

lender.name: Msgr. Louis
lender.loan_because: God has given to me and, as one of His Stewards, I wish to give back in justice and charity in the world around me.
lender.occupational_info: A priest helps people bridge the relationship between themselves and their God. A priest tries to be another Christ to others.

lender.name: Foster Family
lender.loan_because: The Kingdom of God is at hand. Christ has commanded us to restore his world.
lender.occupational_info: Finding ways to serve others, we do this best in relationships and finding ways to touch others lives.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want people to have the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I fix broken computers, install new computers, and work on computer networks.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe in people that want to help themselves with working a small business instead of just looking for handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired after working 20 years driving truck and then managing the office for a small packaging company.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: Its great to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Firefighter/EMR for one of the major oil companies in Canada

lender.name: Ham & Lowe, P.C.
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate in our small business and want to help others, especially in parts of the world where it's not easy to get help. We're very happy to be a part of the Kiva team.....
lender.occupational_info: Help people buy and sell real estate.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to make a better life for themselves. If my donation helps someone achieve that I am honoured.
lender.occupational_info: I order the retail stock for a drugstore.

lender.name: Margarita
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who have a dream to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English Language Arts teacher in West Palm Beach, FL. I teach mostly African-American and Hispanic students aged 11-13.

lender.name: kimmie
lender.loan_because: I want to change some one life for the better. I love to help other.
lender.occupational_info: I can translate for the customer. I am bilingual in VietNamese & English.

lender.name: lolobot
lender.loan_because: Who doesn't like helping others?

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel great helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in at Quad Graphics which is a large magazine and book printing company. I am in charge of the night shift in our distribution department. We ship the magazines all around the world.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping others helps me too.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for the Federal Government in Canada for approximately 30 years. I also have a consulting business that I do part-time.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I spend more than this loan on eating out every week. I amazed to see how so little can do so much good. Thanks, KIVA

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It seems like such a great way to help others have a better life.

lender.name: Mr. B
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I belong to a Red Hat Club. I love to read and travel and help others

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It's a small way I can help others.

lender.name: betsye
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life
lender.occupational_info: I have just retired but worked in hospital operating rooms for 50 years. I helped surgeons make people better.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I love to help people

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Maybe someone can figure out how to make a million out of it- I sure have not been able to.
lender.occupational_info: United Parcel Service - Air District If you send a package someplace in the United States there's a good chance it will be sent to the site I work before going out to it's destination.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I build arch bridges and arch culverts.

lender.name: Jeanmarie
lender.loan_because: I wan to empower others in their businesses, especially women striving to care for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people who want to become teachers how to teach.

lender.name: Nanny to 3
lender.loan_because: I am able to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work in the operating room at a local hospital.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it's a smart way to help
lender.occupational_info: i write articles on charitable opportunities around the world, help small nonprofits find funding, help for profit businesses identify charitable opportunities

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lender.name: mitch
lender.loan_because: To help others

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of these small loans to make a huge difference in the life of someone who is trying to provide a good life and education for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed and work at home doing computer work.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others realize their dreams and make them a reality. I don't have much but I can give what I do have in hopes that I can inspire others to offer their support to this cause.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance industry helping guide our clients with their investments and retirement goals by taking care of their personal accounts with our firm.

lender.name: Dawa
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and I understand that this small individual loans may transform lives of many hardworking people in impoverished countries. Lastly, it makes me feel good.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: It is amazing for ordinary people to help make a difference in someone's life in another country and to help people build their own futures
lender.occupational_info: Finding information sources for others; helping people find the information they need

lender.name: Rogelio
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe people must help others and everyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Manager in a company that works with communications systems

lender.name: Sue Scholle
lender.loan_because: I want to be a blessing in other people's lives. Collectively , for so little we can make a difference in helping others help themselfs.
lender.occupational_info: Past business owner. " Commercial Construction. "

lender.name: Ignacia
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by so many generous people in my life. Without there help and kindness, there's no telling where I'd be. I't my turn to pay it forward.

lender.name: The Forbes Family
lender.occupation: A Family seeking to love and give in Jesus Name
lender.loan_because: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier. Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: Dad is the Director of a mobile mental health crisis team that responds 24/7 to mental health crises in our community. Mom is a student in a pastoral studies program. We have five children, ages 23 to 13.

lender.name: Paulette
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful, secure way to give a 'helping hand'. You know who you're helping out and get to find out how they're doing with their goals. It's personal and that in and of itself makes a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: Since I retired, I spend most of my time writing, wandering the countryside on photo trips and puttering about my cottage and the land on which it sets.

lender.name: Kathy and the Crew
lender.loan_because: I have my own home business, and I'd just like to help someone else do the same.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I work in a bank and I love being the lender. It's a great way for me to do something to help
lender.occupational_info: I'm passionate about banking, and helping people understand it.

lender.name: Jaivyn
lender.loan_because: I want to grow up learning the value of helping others

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. Kiva is a great idea; making it easy for all of us to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but I do work part-time as a mental health counselor. I help people who are suffering from depression, anxiety, phobias, etc.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I can give someone less fortunate than than me what they need to get started.

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: I like to share and give. It is an instant gratitude! I am now approaching my 40th birthday and feel the need to help others. I have been very fortunate in my life and it is now time to pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Major Account Manager for a Canadian Financial Institution (credit union). A credit union is not a bank...it is sort of a CO-OP.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me and I want to extend that to someone else who can benefit

lender.name: Superflywebdesigns.com
lender.loan_because: It is an effective way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Superfly Web Designs offers web development, email campaign, and social media services.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I think this is an awesome way to help someone. What a brilliant idea.
lender.occupational_info: Stay at home mom of two healthy, beautiful children.

lender.name: Patti
lender.occupational_info: I help manage clinical trials that will hopefully lead to better treatments and options for health and wellness.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: It is exciting to be able to loan directly to a person and read about what they will do with the money.
lender.occupational_info: I work as the client services supervisor at the Humane Society Boulder Valley Veterinary Clinic. We are a small animal practice that serves the animal shelter and public clients.

lender.name: Dennis & Pat Watkins
lender.loan_because: Enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Manage golf course .

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to do better and be better and sometimes it only take a little help to do just that!
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who sell food to grocery stores and markets.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful thing to do...to share what you have...no matter how large or small.

lender.name: ROBBIE
lender.loan_because: I'VE BEEN VERY BLESSED ALL OF MY LIFE, NOW IT IS MY TURN TO BLESS OTHERS.

lender.name: Jair
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I understand how a little help can go a long way. I received help from many people as I started a buisness. I believe I should help others because what goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: We help people organize and manage their communities with the goal of keeping them safe, clean and valuable in the housing market.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe someone else could benefit from it.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events for compaines and/or people who are unable to find the time or creativity to do so on their own.

lender.name: Alan Underkofler
lender.loan_because: To help achieve my mission: I am positively affecting the lives of millions of people through humanitarian projects I personally create, fund, or participate in.
lender.occupational_info: I help people increase sales, attract new clients, and build stronger relationships with clients using creative marketing strategies.

lender.name: Nagu
lender.loan_because: microcredit is a great idea.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: Because I can! Helping others makes me feel great.

lender.name: The Linkous Group, Ltd.
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has an obligation to help others and the freedom to choose how to get it done.
lender.occupational_info: Registered Investment Advisor dedicated to helping others realize their goals while working on my own. "We're all in it together!"

lender.name: phil
lender.loan_because: I am helping the less fortunate in the world, hopefully for a better life through my donations

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: If you can help,you should help.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: Without the help of others, I would never have made it this far. It's good to give back. This picture is of my grandson who I do not see. I give for him, too.
lender.occupational_info: I can not work for a company because of illness. I write books but don't get paid yet.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's a very small thing that makes a difference in one life. It makes the world seem friendlier and more hopeful.

lender.name: E. Michelle
lender.loan_because: I am "paying it forward!!"

lender.name: Korey
lender.occupation: Executive Director - Humane Society of the Ozarks

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I feel in my heart that I need to pass the blessing on!
lender.occupational_info: I take children to school and back home again after school!

lender.name: franknel
lender.loan_because: I want to have my own Internet Cafe, to help my self and my family to improve our life. Please give me a change to improve my selp so I can help other too.
lender.occupational_info: Before I've been working to a computer shop. I am the one who repair computers, like desktop and laptop. install hardware and softwares.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward :)
lender.occupational_info: Helping to bring little niracles into the world everyday.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I have always believed in the small business owner and the need to not only work to survive but follow a dream or a passion!
lender.occupational_info: I work on tactical and strategic project for a distribution section of a retail company that is growing in the area in ie-commerce sales

lender.name: Effie
lender.loan_because: I can and because I believe in the power of micro-lending.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: The Kiva staff, these very smart citizens of the world, have made it easy for me to be the philanthropist I always wanted to be.

lender.name: Jami
lender.loan_because: I'v been blessed. My reasons are in my profile pic (my children). I want to make someone else feel blessed as well.
lender.occupational_info: My work is taking care of my family. I have a husband and 2 children in college. One studying to be a doctor and one studying to be a nurse. They are my 'reason.'

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference, no matter how small...in another persons life who truely needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I left my management career to stay at home and raise my children.

lender.name: Cody & Kati
lender.occupation: college students & both work full time
lender.loan_because: God has provided enough in our lives that makes it possible for us to share.

lender.name: Alaskan Family
lender.loan_because: A lot has been given to me and this family.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner who has been there. My family was there for me with loans. I'm just "paying it forward".

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to help other become the best that they can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people gain a better level of health, comfort and self-confidence by improving their dental health

lender.name: Kandice
lender.occupational_info: I clean teeth.

lender.name: Meagan
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do! It feels great to give back to those who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Director of Marketing and Sales for a hospice and palliative care company in Chicago.

lender.name: Doc
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to be living in a country such as Canada, and wish to offer a helping hand to those who are less fortunate, in order that they might live a more fulfilling life by in turn helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday all day, I am privileged to help people with health problems related to their spine and other joints of the body.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve there lives.

lender.name: Chris & Patti
lender.loan_because: We love helping, and we are fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I run a small business myself in addition to working a full time pharmaceutical sales job for the worlds largest pharma company. No sale makes you feel the same as knowing you are helping a motivated entrepreneur in need get one step closer to what we know as "the american dream", it helps me sleep at night :) !
lender.occupational_info: I help people by visiting doctors offices and hospitals and giving them free samples of our drugs for their pts. in need. I also try to educate the doctors as to the differences between drugs they are using (how well they work, cost to patient, side effects, etc...) As a hobby and source of extra income I started my own website as a way of marketing the horses that I am breeding and training on my 20 acre farm. I try to sell a couple horses a year that are show-jumping horses for a little extra money to pay the farm bills.

lender.name: Scott & Donna
lender.loan_because: We like to give a helping hand, not a hand out.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: its time that we all do something for other people...starting one small step at a time, we might actuall make a difference.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: Helping someone else makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I am unemployed

lender.name: PHIL
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in this world to make it!
lender.occupational_info: I am a travelling consultant in the healthcare field.

lender.name: Brent & Jamie
lender.loan_because: it feels great to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Andrew & Jessica
lender.loan_because: We are very blessed, and this is a very small way for us to give back.

lender.name: CRUZ
lender.occupation: hair and make up artist / antiques dealer

lender.name: leza
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a wonderful life and would like to help others create that for themselves.

lender.name: Bridgette
lender.loan_because: My family wants to help.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Sharing makes my heart happy. : )
lender.occupational_info: Studying to be a Licensed Massage Therapist.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I am a female business owner and I know how much others have helped me and I would like to give back, especially in honor of my grandmother Clydene .
lender.occupational_info: I work with young people.

lender.name: Glenna
lender.loan_because: We wanted to find something meaningful for a memorial tribute to our son Jeff. He died in January 2007. He was a city Firefighter. Kiva is a perfect way to honor him.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: How can I not? All those people in need, while I live a comfortable life just because I was born "here" and not "there".
lender.occupational_info: I own a gift shop.

lender.name: Devan
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the world, and to teach my kids the value of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I write software that helps small businesses to stay competitive and to thrive.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: i have a dream to help people in need that have good causes.
lender.occupational_info: i am an 8th grade student. and my favorite class is science.

lender.name: Glenda
lender.occupation: General Electric Nuclear Fuels, PMQC Inspector
lender.loan_because: My mother is from Mexico and I have seen firsthand how poor some of her family is and the Mexican population overall. Had she not met my father, who was in the military, she would very likely be living the same kind of life. I have been blessed with a good job and feel the need to share my good fortune. I wish all the business men and women the very best and hope you will have a better life with the help of Kiva. org. God bless you all. Glenda

lender.name: Beata
lender.loan_because: I am too lucky, too blessed to have everything I already do. It is time to share it with those who have little or sometimes nothing at all. And it really does feel better to give than to receive :)

lender.name: craig
lender.loan_because: as a small business owner i realize how difficult it is to get ahead. i'm also very fortunate to have an education along with immediate access to resources that so many others around the world aren't so lucky to have. so when my friend Amanda turned me onto kiva.org it just seemed like such a brilliant idea. bravo, kiva. bravo.
lender.occupational_info: i write and create greeting cards that fall under the category of adult humor.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling!
lender.occupational_info: I work on medical software.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: we live in a global community and we need to help our global neighbors. Kiva allows my small contribution, grouped with others, to make a difference in someone's life. I have, so I should give.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.occupational_info: i park, fuel, and tow planes. then on the weekends i work behind the desk at the airport being a customer service rep.

lender.name: myra
lender.loan_because: i want to help. its always a great feeling to know you're helping someone make their dreams come true or/and to know at least that, that person is able to put food on the table for her/his family.
lender.occupational_info: work in an acute care hospital where i care and advocate for patients needs.

lender.name: PML
lender.loan_because: The world needs to come together and I have so much to share, and feel grateful for what I have. I love the opportunity to share with others in this meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to others and help them to live their lives with more joy, less pain.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I deeply care that everyone gets a chance to live the life they have always imagined!
lender.occupational_info: I worked as the National Media Spokesperson for Energizer on the Susan G. Komen 3-day for the Cure since 2009.

lender.name: Jim and Denise
lender.occupation: Retired Police Captain; Retired computer teacher
lender.loan_because: At such a small cost to us, we can positively impact someone's life. How awesome is that?
lender.occupational_info: Jim handled personnel management and assorted law enforcement duties in a municipal police department. Denise is bored.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I would love to have started a business, but never did. I enjoy watching others do it. I have a home in China and United States and love visiting all parts of the world. I hope my investment into the world helps those that get it.
lender.occupational_info: I do neuroscience nursing which is back, neck, and brain surgery with a well trained group of doctors. I also work with the medical end of neuronursing which deals with strokes, brain bleeding, and other neuro problems of the body.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Student in multimedia design and self-employed with a mobile dog grooming business.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help from there brother or sister ,sometimes.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Just a little boost can make a huge difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an executive for a department store called Saks Fifth Avenue.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I believe it's our duty to make the world a better place by helping one another whenever and however possible. I also want to be a positive role model for my children and students so they learn the importance of helping others. I want them to appreciate that true happiness comes from giving back. Kindness and generosity are best taught by example.
lender.occupational_info: University professor

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: every person can make a difference

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I can. I should. And I will.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I can. Everyone should. It takes so little to have a positive impact on the world.
lender.occupational_info: human search engine

lender.name: Two kids from Oaktown
lender.loan_because: We want to grow up to be givers.
lender.occupational_info: We play, go to school and dream just like other little kids all over the world.

lender.name: CYRENE
lender.loan_because: I have worked hard to raise my son and give him good values, now he is off to college and I realize how fortunate we both are. I need to continue to give, if not to my son but financially to other who need help to advance.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an ambulance company doing life support transports from one hospital to another.

lender.name: Dorrie
lender.loan_because: I come from a small, start from scratch, family business. And because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a RN in a busy Emergency Department.

lender.name: kalifa. .Dawn
lender.occupation: i work and city market an Avon c.o
lender.loan_because: I have to
lender.occupational_info: I have to meck thing's going allover caus I have a lot of people that i know across the world french. to senegal. to Ivory coast . Nigeria. congo. Japon . england Italy. Thank God and thank you who ever reading this msg and i am sorry for the folt's.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: Giving and helping people in need is a true gift to my life. I believe anything is possible when you have a dream. I am never surprised to hear of or know people that are willing to work hard for their survival and loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: I am in advertising and currently am a publisher of an auto magazine. My work is very demanding but fun as I get to meet all great individuals. I am originally from San Pedro Sula, Honduras and am very aware of the struggles in developing countries. I only wish I could do more.

lender.name: dianne
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their abilities! Everyone needs a chance to shine :)
lender.occupational_info: I work with students that have disabilities and help them become readers.

lender.name: Ebru & Joseph
lender.loan_because: To help empower people in need around the world.

lender.name: Viktor
lender.loan_because: As an Entreprenuer I know how it can be a struggle to secure that first ever loan or credit to get a business going.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Change Management. I help company's to start or restructure their businesses. I primarly work in the Media- and Advertising industry.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: it's one way to help others grow their businesses and, hopefully, enrich their lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a great team of technical writers for a high-tech data storage company.

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Trading with Asian Countries

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: nothing shows gratitude better than giving to others.

lender.name: Tony & Sara
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us so greatly, it is our privilage to help others.

lender.name: Janet Marie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others. Win/Win Situation. I now belong to the Heartland Oklahoma Lending Team. Strength in numbers!
lender.occupational_info: I design websites.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I care about people who need money and need a job. It makes me feel good to help people who need to be helped.
lender.occupational_info: I swim for a swim team and go to school.

lender.name: DENNIS
lender.loan_because: I believe the world would be a better place if we all tried to help each other in small business.
lender.occupational_info: I produce feed for live stock, horses, cows, sheep, goats, llamas, and even rabbits. I sell most of my hay to other farmers.

lender.name: Alnore
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me; worked hard and smart. I am blessed with the love of my life. The micro-finance makes sense and want to participate. I re-circulate my loans and lend incremently when I have a good month or have spent too much during that month!
lender.occupational_info: I have started a second career in Risk management and capital preservation.

lender.name: jen
lender.loan_because: ive been blessed with health and happiness and would like to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: exciting, rewarding

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I have always felt like i couldn't help but i have realized that i can do something and I hope that this is just start of that revelation. I have also never considered myself a business savvy person but love the idea og helping others pursue there own dreams, like an art appreciator supporting an artist's endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently finishing my bachelor degree in anthropology and hope to get a job as an ESL instructor in Japan and then grad school.

lender.name: emma
lender.loan_because: i want to help people worldwide . I would like to help change things so that people are mpre productive/independent.
lender.occupational_info: i provide all levels of health care to children and adults.

lender.name: Stephan & Ronlyn
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending has proven to be a seriously productive and positive way for an individual to reach out and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I do research, and write about my exploration of that part of us unlimited by space or time. My papers, books, and electronic media can found at my personal website listed below. I also study and write about the trends that are shaping the cultures of the world, and our collective future. My daily web publication on this aspect of my work can be found at: www.schwartzreport.net. My bi-monthly essays appear in the journal Explore: www.explorejournal.com/content/schwartz

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Luke 6:20-21 Blessed are you who are poor, for yours is the kingdom of God. Blessed are you who hunger now, for you shall be satisfied. Blessed are you who weep now, for you shall laugh.
lender.occupational_info: Jesus, help me do your will, promote your glory and advance your kingdom.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Just because a person is born in a particular country, or into a particular family, should not condemn him to poverty for life.
lender.occupational_info: currently without employment--by choice

lender.name: Lorie
lender.loan_because: I can. If one has, one should give. I have, therefore, I give.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very rewarding. I get to help people everyday.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who try.
lender.occupational_info: I helped people travel to visit other countries and meet the wonderful people in the world

lender.name: Kiri
lender.loan_because: By lending, I am creating the possibility for people to achieve their dreams. I believe that every small thing we can do to help others counts.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Assistant Manager for lululemon athletica in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. lululemon athletica specializes in yoga-inspired athletic apparel.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everyone was born with a dream, but not everyone was born into money. Reality is simply the limitations we set upon our dreams. Kiva removes these limitations, and creates a whole new reality.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: Free markets, self sufficiency and personal pride go a long way to make the world better.
lender.occupational_info: I help design new communications products that make it easier for people to communicate worldwide.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to see everyone succeed and to be able to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic & Web Designer

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to help someone from the comfort of my own home on my own computer wearing nothing but boxers.
lender.occupational_info: Cisco Relationship Counselor

lender.name: Baard
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting local entrepreneurs. They'll put the money to good use in their community and stimulate the local economy. And - they pay it back, so we can lend it on to others. Perfect.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working people instead of just giving for charity.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a specialized technician onboard ships and I live traveling the world in my job, so I see the conditions people live in.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.occupation: Owner of Animal Ultrasound Services business

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I have more than opportunity to make sure someone else has the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I worked as an extender of credit in a commercial setting.

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful feeling to provide this temporary assistance that benefits so many families around the world :)
lender.occupational_info: Sales of various telecommunication services

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: my extended family used to run the kinds of businesses you can invest in on this site.

lender.name: scott anthony
lender.loan_because: if i have extra and even times when i don't, its just eh rite thing to do for the even lesser fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: property owner in the states and abroad.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Terra
lender.loan_because: I was placed on this earth to make people smile. Hopefully this will small gift will help make someone smile some where in this earth.
lender.occupational_info: I am unable to work because of a illness, but still wish to put that smile on someones face. :)

lender.name: Hans Arvid
lender.loan_because: Assisting people to help themselves suits my philosophy.
lender.occupational_info: creative

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: I had been blessed with help in difficult times in my life, it helped make a difference. I love being able to help someone in need. I wish you all good fortune and health.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: Make-up and hairdressing girls stick together and support each other! It's a great feeling after you've given someone a makeover and got them to feel good about themselves! May that feeling spread across the world!
lender.occupational_info: I create make-ups and hairstyles for actors appearing on stage, television and film.

lender.name: Nita
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying forward those blessings I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I am a preachers wife and help with teaching and training others.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I hope it will do some good.
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time as a consultant to companies and individuals on information technology issues and a variety of general business problems.

lender.name: Kathy & David
lender.occupation: Medical Office Management / Small Business Owners
lender.loan_because: Because we can. We love the stories and the drive that people have to succeed. Kiva gives us an opportunity to share some of our success with others in need of a helping hand.

lender.name: molly
lender.loan_because: I enjoy passing on blessings to others.
lender.occupational_info: I've taught elementary school in a rural area of Mississippi for the past eighteen years.

lender.name: Elfreda
lender.loan_because: I am helping to make a difference.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: As a Canadians we have so many advantages that are unimaginable to so many people. It is my honour and privilege to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Kenya, and this is a great way to help my home country
lender.occupational_info: I am a career coach, helping professionals managing their careers. I work principally in New York and Washington DC with the top lawyers in the USA

lender.name: Milena (Mina)
lender.loan_because: Well it says it right there on the main page. They are "loans that change lives". What an easy way to leave a positive mark behind. Everyone who can should be doing this!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital for the computer department. I am an email administrator. I manage the electronic messaging system with two other people and help staff at the hospital with email problems and requests. I work with a lot of great people. My workplace also changes people's lives. :) Guess it's trend for me. he he

lender.name: kate
lender.loan_because: It feels great to connect with the larger world.
lender.occupational_info: As a midwife I support families with newborn babies as a potter I play with clay and bring my wares to market==that is understandable anywhere in the world!

lender.name: Alexandre
lender.loan_because: It's good to help people make their own way

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: We all can make a differance ,even though we think it is small
lender.occupational_info: I own a storage facility. It is rows of rooms for people to put in their possesions if they don't have room in their home

lender.name: amy jane.
lender.loan_because: What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal. - Albert Pine
lender.occupational_info: i am a cloud-computing marketeer for a boston-based technology company.

lender.name: Shea & Cleo
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand. It is not a hand-out but a hand-up!!! :-)
lender.occupational_info: Shea works with electronics and Cleo (wife) works with at-risk children

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I like helping others
lender.occupational_info: I help the sick and injured.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I want to help people out.
lender.occupational_info: I write and perform music.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: The only way the world will work is if everyone supports everyone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired civil rights lawyer, and now I am a writer and a model.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: ...I can. I loan to the fish sellers because my mom is a fisherwoman. And I loan to the vegetable mongers because I wish I were among them.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: joey
lender.loan_because: ...I am part of the most affluent culture in the history of humanity...
lender.occupational_info: I capture people's stories and share them with as many people as I can

lender.name: Chrissy
lender.loan_because: I have enough to share, and so it just makes sense.

lender.name: Natalee
lender.loan_because: "Every mikkle mek a muckle" - Jamaican proverb which means "every little bit counts."

lender.name: Elissa
lender.occupation: Web Developer and Fused glass designer
lender.loan_because: I know I am fortunate and want to help others reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company on their Web site. Web sites, like Kiva.com, have a lot of people who work on making pictures, gathering content, writing content, and keeping the most up to date information on the site. This is what I do.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us so we can be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: Our business works similar to Amazon.com's affiliate marketing program.

lender.name: MARILYN
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN SOMEONES LIFE. TO HELP THEM BETTER THEIR CIRCUMSTANCES

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are brave enough to run a business and make or sell something that they have made. I think it takes a lot of courage.
lender.occupational_info: I help children who have a hard time learning in school by helping their teachers, giving advice to their parents, and helping them get extra time with special education teachers.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help from time to time.God loves us all.....
lender.occupational_info: I make beds and cushions for big pleasure boats.Sometimes we do curtains too

lender.name: thevirgos
lender.loan_because: There is nothing greater than the feeling of being in control of your destiny. Empowering people to change their lives allows them to make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Friends in Holladay Utah
lender.loan_because: For Christmas gifts I give my children and my neighbors and loan to Kiva in their name.
lender.occupational_info: I do many different jobs. I work in the mornings in a large office and I manage a Villa in Mexico using the internet. Then I visit the Villa 4 or 5 times a year. In the afternoon I do design work. I design cabinets for homes. Sometimes I do Photography I specialize in taking photos of children.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to make a living and raise children. I wish someone had helped me when I was younger. I think this is a great thing and it makes me feel good to help someone else.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It's my goal in life to help others that ned it. I want to give back to the community.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Its such a little thing to do..hope it helps.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I want to be a help to someone who is deserving and trying to accomplish something in this life
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding, very busy and Helpful to women.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It helps me to feel connected to something greater than myself. Micro-loans are incredible because they allow you to have a direct impact on someone's life you otherwise may have never known about.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a company who's mission is to provide financial solutions for a lifetime. On a day to day basis I am focused on helping educate and provide solutions to our clients so they can feel confident and protected in their financial future.

lender.name: James & Shannon
lender.loan_because: We want to pass along the blessing that we have received. We hope to improve someone's life so that they can pass it on to others.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I joined Kiva.org because there have been times in my life that I have needed financial help and have been fortunate to find someone generous enough to offer a loan to me to when the banks and almighty credit score said no. At times it was a total stranger, and at times it was a friend. Because of these experiences in my life, I have a genuine understanding of how it feels to have a dream or a goal that is harnessed and held back by the lack of this thing we call money. In recent years my financial situation has stabilized so now I am giving back what I can to those who are making an effort to improve themselves and improve the quality of their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large telecommunications corporation weekdays then on weekends have my own small business which sells and installs products. Once I install the products, I program the house to suit the owner's need by turning their house into smarthome.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Giving is the way to make the world connected not only financially but on a karmic level. Pay it forward.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and what can be done when monetary resources are made available on a micro-economic level.
lender.occupational_info: University administration.

lender.name: Dario & Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It's a simple way to make a difference in the life of someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Dario trains new recruiters for a national IT staffing industry. Stephanie recruits engineers for positions throughout the US Mid-Atlantic region.

lender.name: jill
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of something that operates out of compassion for others
lender.occupational_info: I no longer teach but I was a Science teacher

lender.name: Ayiesha
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky and so grateful to be able to help

lender.name: ngungo
lender.loan_because: of others: khongquan, yenchi.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: I help grow ideas from entrepreneurs

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to model global citizenship. Every day I challenge young people in my school to stand up and make a difference - this is a tool that I can use to transform lives as part of a greater community.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: The ability to earn money is a gift from god and one should share that and all gifts. - John D. Rockerfeller
lender.occupational_info: Computer Software Sales

lender.name: AL
lender.loan_because: This is the way to bring about "REAL" change in people's lives. By giving them a HAND-UP, they will better their lives and hopefully they will pass their good fortune forward, and so we change the face of poverty one person at a time. Some may think this way is futile or it is not making enough of an impact. I say, look at all the money that has been donated to the poor worldwide... has there been real change? No !! This is the way to go. Help people help themselves.There is self pride and the feeling of accomplishment by the entrepreneur.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: It is one way that one person can help. Not a hand out, but truly a hand-up.

lender.name: Alexina
lender.loan_because: I believe in abundance, not scarcity. I believe in the inherent worth and dignity of all people, and giving a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very busy surgical unit at a large metropolitan hospital in Washington, DC. I gladly serve people from all walks of life.

lender.name: Cathy Renee
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and to be a part of that is exciting and a blessing!

lender.name: Elm Middle School
lender.loan_because: We're interested in people around the world.

lender.name: Dee Dee
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel wonderful.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching people how to be exceptional customer service representatives is what I do best and I love to share it as a consultant.

lender.name: nhm tetet
lender.loan_because:
of: caonguyen em sa ra bank i tin, chieuhoang, hihi, lc no cng d thng, dieulinh nui heo em c ta, ul ul unbuo, yenchi nhn nha b ng.
.
lender.occupational_info:
20 thng 9, 2007 Knh tha anh ch,
C hai tun ny ngungo khng lend c ai c, ngungo vo din n Kiva Friends made a mild complain th c mch nc. Hm qua ngungo lend c cho ch (b th ng hn, 50 tui ri) bn qun o Nguyn Th Nhung Sc Sn gn H Ni. Nh vy Nhm tetet c 3 loan accounts, nhng ngungo mong mi c nhiu c hi hn. Anh ch kin nhn t nha. ngungo vng tay cm n anh ch, v ngungo cng khng dm qun cm n Ban iu Hnh trang mng tetet.net.
Knh mn, ngungo
Tng cng hin kim nhn c cho n ngy 6 thng 9, 2007 l 78.00 USD.
NHT K: 4 thng 9, 2007 - Bnh, ngh nh, xem chng trnh Oprah 5 thng 9, 2007 - ng vin anh ch trang nh tetet.net 6 thng 9, 2007 - Ghi danh thnh vin Kiva - khongquan m hng 8 thng 9, 2007 - Ln u cho mn n: L Th Minh Tm, trng thanh long 9 thng 9, 2007 - Hong Th Tnh Sng ch nht tri trong, sao trong lng thinh thch
11 thng 9, 2007 - K nim 6 nm 9/11 19 thng 9, 2007 - L Th Nhung, tim bn qun o 24 thng 9, 2007 - Trn Th Thy, lm cm ru
.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to support themselves and their families. This gives me an opportunity to give my blessings back to others.

lender.name: The Puglisi Family
lender.loan_because: Because I know how it is to be with out money
lender.occupational_info: Out of work right now .... Depressed but still love to help people

lender.name: Kristen
lender.occupation: Sr. Admin Asst in Biotech Co.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.occupation: Executive Assistant to CEO, Senior Partners
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people trying to make their way and provide for their families, particularly women in country torn by rebellion and war.
lender.occupational_info: I support the senior partners in an asset management company now. I worked in the public sector for 30 years in womens issues, politics, union organizing, and health care.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: How can I not? No matter how little I think I have, it is an abundance compared to some.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I think helping someone else achieve their dreams and goals is a wonderful thing. With all the chaos going on in the world it makes me feel good that I can contribute something to someone as a selfless act and maybe change their lives in return.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the US, majoring in criminal justice with a minor in forensic science. I am currently a sophomore and I plan to attend law school once I receive my bachelor's degree. Once out of law school I would like to work for the UN and be able to address human rights which is very important to me personally.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: it takes such a small amount of money to help some one acheive their financial goals.

lender.name: Nelson & Pat
lender.loan_because: We care!
lender.occupational_info: Nelson-- Retired Ford motor Co. Pat--Retired Hospice Nurse

lender.name: Erin & Kaylie
lender.loan_because: To be a blessing to others

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupation: AE for a global graphics company
lender.loan_because: I love this idea of people from all over the world helping others...no borders, no boundries.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: life has been good to me and opportunity, sought and found, has come without pain. It is time to give to others and keep Karma flowing.
lender.occupational_info: I own a restaurant in Delaware (the US) and I run an IT and Management Consulting firm.

lender.name: Patrick and Tara
lender.loan_because: We feel like we are funding something tangible

lender.name: belinda
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful feeling to help someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people breath better

lender.name: Lenny
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to third world countries . We have seen how those who have so little . We know when you can help how happy they are to get ahead working to make life better.
lender.occupational_info: We worked with AIDS for 20 years . Now we work in a free medical group. We feel that helping those who need makes life a little better for all.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those in need. Better to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm stuck in the U.S. military (not a great choice for me). Someday I want to be involved with organic agriculture.

lender.name: Mallory
lender.loan_because: I can and I care, Everyone deserves a chance at a good and stable future, and this allows me to help others get just that. :)
lender.occupational_info: I attend school and hope to work in film and tv one day.

lender.name: Chiong Mei
lender.loan_because: my owner wishes to remain anonymous. He was lucky enough to be born in the United States where resources to give to others are plentiful.
lender.occupational_info: My owner earned a degree in Human Studies and have spent the last 8 years helping homeless people, people with HIV/AIDS and victims of Physical and Sexual Violence.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: A small way to help someone.
